author: henning
msg: - Convert the AccessControlList class into an interface.
This is a breaking change which cannot be deprecated, so we do
it here in a development series and get on with life.
- Add methods to the security service to retrieve a new acl object
and the class of the currently used acl
- Convert DBSecurityService and LDAPSecurityService to return a
factory created object and not a hard coded AccessControlList
